summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 3
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Friday, with nine gaining and the other 10 declining.
Bitcoin fell 4.9% to $22,328 by market close.
